resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81709</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81709</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4263</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Starting to Count</string>
            <string language="es">Empezar a contar</string>
            <string language="ga">Tosú ag Comhaireamh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beginnen zu zählen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Commencer à compter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Começar contar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Iniziare a contare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έναρξη να μετρά</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Group activity where pupils match the dots on dice with real objects and eventually number cards. Suitable for students with Mild/Moderate Special Needs.</string>
            <string language="es">Actividad de grupo donde los alumnos relacionan los puntos de un dado con objetos reales y finalmente tarjetas de números. Apropiada para estudiantes con necesidades especiales leves/moderadas.</string>
            <string language="ga">Gníomhaíocht ghrúpa inar féidir le daltaí spotaí ar dhísle a chur le nithe eile agus ina dhiaidh sin le cártaí uimhreach. Feiliúnach do mhic léinn le Riachtanais Speisialta Bhoga/Mheasarthacha.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Maths</string>
            <string language="es">Matemáticas. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Mata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gruppieren Sie Aktivität, wo Pupillen die Punkte 
auf Würfeln mit realen Nachrichten zusammenbringen und schließlich 
Karten numerieren. Verwendbar für Kursteilnehmer mit 
Mild/Moderate speziellen Notwendigkeiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Groupez l'activité où les pupilles apparient les
points sur des matrices avec de vrais objets et numérotent par la 
suite des cartes. Approprié aux étudiants avec les besoins 
spéciaux de Mild/Moderate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Agrupe a atividade onde as pupilas combinam os 
pontos em dados com os objetos reais e numeram eventualmente cartões.
Apropriado para estudantes com necessidades especiais de 
Mild/Moderate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Raggruppi l'attività dove le pupille abbinano i 
puntini sui dadi con gli oggetti reali e finalmente numerano le 
schedi. Adatto ad allievi con i bisogni speciali di 
Mild/Moderate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η δραστηριότητα ομάδας όπου οι μαθητές ταιριάζουν με 
τα σημεία χωρίζει σε τετράγωνα επάνω με τα πραγματικές 
αντικείμενα και τελικά τις κάρτες αριθμού. Κατάλληλος για 
τους σπουδαστές με ήπιο/συγκρατήστε τις ειδικές ανάγκες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per la matematica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
